name: RoboPillar
description:
ROBOPILLAR by Long Distance Developers 

Controls:
- WASD and Mouse for movement
- Left-Click: Building, Right-Click: Harvesting waste
- 1: Choose cover as  building type (currently no other building types)

Game Goal: Pick up all the trash and junk on the wasted Earth, to repair the Air-Pollution-Filter-Tower. You can recycle the trash to defend yourself from the Pollution-Bots.
Will you succeed in cleaning the earth and make it a better place?
Try our game and give us feedback.

Enjoy!
 

We chose Theme 4, Play to learn and Theme 5,  Back to the Future.
RoboPillar has a retro feel, cause of its simplicity to it, we wanted to make it feel like back in the good old days.

But more importantly we want to raise awareness to climate change and environmental pollution. If we don't take care of our planet our future might look like our game. Although we love our RoboPillar, we hope he wont have to clean up our Earth in the future.
